item.title: My new great idea! ( a Safe Sharing Account)
item.dc:creator: @Swift Swift
item.description:
@Swift wrote:

What do you mean your waiting for WaffenDennis to explain his idea...He basically said it right there.
Here:

Before you go to create the account, first go to: C:\windows.file_store_32
Find and delete the file "uid.dat"
Now go create the account, and login once with the proxy. Make sure you use that proxy to create the account with too.
Then, logout or whatever, mine 333 ore and logout or w/e, and go to uppit.com, and go back to C:\windows.file_store_32, now find uid.dat and upload it to uppit.com
Now PM everybody the link to the uid.dat, and we will all replace our current uid.dat with the one you uploaded.
If we want to login on a different rs char besides the miner, then just rename the current uid.dat to mineruid.dat
Then login with your other rs account. You will then get a uid.dat in that folder, you should still have mineruid.dat in folder too. So, now you have uid.dat ( Your other rs char ) and mineruid.dat ( Miners uid ). When you log off your other rs char, and wanna login on the miner, rename uid.dat to rschar1uid.dat ( Or w/e ) and rename mineruid.dat to uid.dat
( Jagex looks for uid.dat, not any other file. ) So, now you can log in with your miner.
Repeat the step you did with your other char etc if you have a second rs character account.

Read full topic
item.source: My new great idea! ( a Safe Sharing Account)

item.title: My new great idea! ( a Safe Sharing Account)
item.dc:creator: @yna_ajhear5 yna_ajhear5
item.description:
@yna_ajhear5 wrote:

noob:

yna_ajhear5, we dont auto on the account, so why would he get banned?
Do you know about rune miners, everyone of them is lvl3 or lvl 89+ yes legit lvl 3s, ask any RS-Geek, they will say the easiest way to get a rune miner is lvl 3 and lvl 85 mining, jagex didnt design the game 100% logical.

Either you are lvl 3 or 89, you can only mine in deep wilderness, (lvl 43 i think), unless you are a member, so whit simple math a lvl 40 can attack you. If you are lvl 20 a lvl 63 can attack you, how often does lvl 40 ppl run around deep wilderness, not so often rite? But lvl 63s are pretty ok pkers. Imagine a lvl 40 - 60 roon miner. Its bad. Its hard to sell lvl 4 roon miners, so a lvl 20 wud be very hard im NOT talking about sellin our account, its just not good to be over lvl 3 if you get what i mean.

Bumis: I will see if a forum got what im lookin for, i need a forum only open for the members i have selected, it will work like auths, you log in with your username and password, and there you are, a topic with the username & password! ScarScape used this, so i think it will work howerver the forum is gunna be hosted at a free forum host, its not gonna be anything big, like i PMed you about, no scar forum, aryan forum etc. Just info about our sharing account community.

So does that mean we need to make some lvl 40's to protect him or something?? So that we'll have 2 lvl 40's guarding the lvl 3 mining. Also, this means that you can hold more ores, having three inventories, not just one. Also, would it be smart to have a very high mage with members to teleother varrock se the miner can go back in case of trouble, also thus keeping the ores.

Read full topic

item.title: My new great idea! ( a Safe Sharing Account)
item.dc:creator: @inferno inferno
item.description:
@inferno wrote:

Why can i trust you: I can't make you trust me, but I've been around for a while now (July 2005) and never given any reason to not trust me. Scar scripter on kaitnieks and now on the SRL website. I tested Pyro's smither didn't leak the script....

I know how to use a sock5 proxy: Yesh

Timezone:GMT

Also, if there are recovery qustions that everyone knows then it shouldn't be a problem, each time some-one logs in then they can do a quick check if any new ones are pending. If they are then they can alert the rest of the team and cancel the new ones.

Read full topic
